remarks: The algebra scalars function is a group homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
asclf.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
asclf.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
asclf.r $e |- ( ph -> W e. Ring ) $.
asclf.l $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
asclghm $p |- ( ph -> A e. ( F GrpHom W ) ) $.
